text: David Byrd (born September 8, 1957) is an American politician and retired basketball coach. He is a Republican. Byrd represented the 71st district of the Tennessee House of Representatives since 2015. He was born in Waynesboro, Tennessee. On December 10, 2020 Byrd was hospitalized in Waynesboro with COVID-19 and placed in a ventilator. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: David Byrd (politician)
